body.name: PRETTYCARE Cordless Vacuum Cleaner, Self-Standing, 25Kpa Powerful Suction Stick Vacuum with Smart LED Display, 40Min Long Runtime Brushless Motor, Lightweight Vacuum for Hardwood Floor Carpet Pet Hair
features: 🎁【25Kpa Powerful Suction+Deep Cleaning All Floors】:PRETTYCARE cordless vacuum cleaner is equipped with an upgrade 100,000 RMP brushless motor. The stick vacuum provides super suction power of 25KPa in MAX mode for deep cleaning of pet hair, dust, crumbs and large particles on carpets, hardwood floors, etc. The brushless motor generates less noise (63db), which results in more energy-saving and longer service life compared with other regular brushed motors

🎁【Self-Standing & Easy Rest Design】: Need to take a break while cleaning? The Easy Rest self-standing unique design allows you to conveniently rest the vacuum anywhere you want without the danger of the vacuum falling over. This hardwood floor vacuum is also very space saving, can stand on the floor without drilling holes or hanging the vacuum cleaner on the wall.

🎁【Long-Lasting Runtime+Smart LED Display】:Vacuum cleaner cordless built-in 2200 mAh high-capacity battery lasts for 40 Mins in standard mode and 20 minutes in max mode. Smart LED power display can help you check the remaining power at a glance. Convenient for you to know the usage and charge in advance.

🎁【Ultra-Lightweight+Easy to Clean】:3lb lightweight vacuum cleaner helps you clean your home easily. Wireless design allows you to get rid of power cord, making cleaning more convenient. Stick vacuum cleaner comes with a wealth of accessories, including dusting brush and long crevice tool, easily converts into 6 types of cordless stick vacuum, perfect for whole house cleaning, such as floors, stairs, sofas, windows, etc.

🎁【Flexible Brush with Headlights+Better Cleaning Results】:The maneuverable 180° side-to-side rotation and 90° up-and-down rotation allow you to easily clean under furniture area, and the LED light helps the vacuum cleaner cordless illuminate every dark corner and track dirt.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: PRETTYCARE P4 Brings Smart and More Efficient Cleaning Experience to Your Home!

Previous page 25Kpa super suction power is perfect for deep cleaning hardwood floors and carpets. Next page 1 Versatile Brush Head 2 Suitable for All Floors 3 Efficiency Filtration 4 Anti-tangled Brush

Ultra-Lightweight 4lb ultra-lightweight body helps you clean your home easily, especially cleaning above the floor area Maneuverable Head with LED The maneuverable head allow you to easily clean under furniture area, and the LED light helps the vacuum cleaner illuminate every dark corner and track dirt Low Noise Cleaning With less than 65 dB noise level, you can clean home without annoying disturb.

Wall-Mount Rack The stable wall mount holds the vacuum and two accessories onboard for easy storage and charging. Washable Filtration System Filtration system are washable and reusable, and we recommend you clean them once a week to extend the life of the motor. Extensible Metal Tube The adjustable aluminum tube enable you to take it anywhere, and reach different heights to clean dust on the curtains or ceiling effortlessly. One-click Dust Release Release the trash with a click of a button, and the 1.3L large-capacity dust cup meets your whole-house cleaning needs.

What is the difference between P4 and W100? P4 is the upgraded version of W100, we added the LED display and the latest brushless motor on the basis of W100. Why brushless motor better than brushed motor? The brushless motor generates less heat and noise (63db), which results in more energy-saving and longer service life, compared with other regular brushed motors. Can this vacuum cleaner be used on different floors? PRETTYCARE P4 vacuum cleaner with 25Kpa super suction power is perfect for deep cleaning hardwood floors and carpets.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 20, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars I'm glad I bought this!
reviews.reviewText: I have a 2 story home with hardwood floors on the entire lower level. It's super light weight and easy to grab for a quick daily vacuum of my downstairs. I am happy to keep this vacuum on hand in my down stairs closet so I don't have to drag my heavier Dyson downstairs every time I want to clean. You need to go over some areas a few times to pick up visible dust or crumbs and it doesn't hold a full charge for too long, but long enough to get a quck clean up done. I've also used it on flat area rugs and it works well. In addition, it's great to use on furniture! I'm happy I puchased this and would recommend it as an inexpensive cleaning tool.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 30, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars A bargain cordless stuck vacuum
reviews.reviewText: My wife is confined to a wheelchair, but is insistent upon doing some of the work around the house. The corded Shark vacuum is good but difficult to maneuver from the wheelchair. She had a Dirt Devil corded stick vacuum, but, again it was difficult to maneuver from a wheelchair plus its canister would just fall off, dumping what you had just vacuumed into the floor again. The had a lighting deal on this rechargeable stick vacuum by Prettycare and the reviews were pretty good. It turned out to be a blessing. It is light, well balanced, easy to use with a myriad of adjustments which turned out to be the greatest asset that this machine has, which is the ability to adjust the length. This alone was invaluable. I have to hand it to Prettycare for a great product!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 19, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great customer service and convenient product
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. This is my second stick vacuum I’ve bought from PrettyCare, the first one I had for about a year and a half but unfortunately the battery life started to diminish. I reached out to PrettyCare and they were incredibly helpful and responsive and offered to send me this newer version free of charge. I’ve been using it for about a week and I’m very impressed! For the price you really can’t beat it, its battery lasts long enough to clean both floors of my house and still be running. It has a light that turns on that is super convenient for seeing hair/dust that you can’t usually see. I have 2 cats so litter and hair is a nuisance and pulling out a big vacuum that needs to be plugged in is a real pain so this makes cleaning quick and easy. I’m very impressed with the quality at such a low price and after how responsive and helpful their support team was I will continue to stick with this brand.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 13, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Good and convenient
reviews.reviewText: I had been using a variety of methods of cleaning my floors until I discovered this Pretty Care vacuum. It is lightweight enough to use with one hand, has a wall storage clamp, and two attachments, one for narrow spaces and corners and another for upholstery of wall webs and pet hair. It is easy to use because it's cordless and just powerful enough to do bare floors and thin rugs like in the bathroom. It charges fairly quickly and holds enough charge to do my 1200 sq ft home. The only drawbacks are that the battery is not removable and thus not replaceable, so when the battery gives out you have to purchase a new unit. It is also, as I said, "just powerful enough." It does have 2 speeds, but the lower one I have not found a use for. Perhaps for curtains, which I don't have, or a keyboard, which I haven't tried. Overall, I am very pleased.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 23, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Best bang for my buck
reviews.reviewText: Honestly, coolest vacuum. Tops the Dyson I bought. I really like it! Idk about longevity of it but it’s really great and powerful and so far I’m enjoying it. Had it for the last week or so.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 31, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect for an apartment
reviews.reviewText: I’m so glad I got this vacuum, I love it! And actually enjoy vacuuming now. It’s light, small, not too loud, turns very smoothly, and works really well. I have an 800 sqft apartment and I’m able to vacuum the entire place with one charge. I use power 2 off and on throughout. I think both power levels work well. I would recommend this for spaces less than 1000 sqft, or buy more than one! Price and value are great.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 14, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Best purchase i have made
reviews.reviewText: This is the best vacuum i have every purchased. It is light weight, stands on its own, with the light showing the dirt, hair and dust bunnies. The suction is the best. The different attachments help with cleaning hard to get places. Easy cleaning!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 20, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Amazing Little Vacuum
reviews.reviewText: This is my second Prettycare vacuum cleaner. My first one had me sold on this vacuum. I love the low price and the flexibility it gives me. The light on the front illuminates the debris on the floor and makes cleaning so much easier. Had some issues with my first older version but customer service was amazing!!! So responsive! Communicated multiple times, worked with me to solve my issue, and I am completely satisfied. Customer for life. 5-Stars for sure!
